What does the 15 Days Plus offer include?

The 15 Days Plus offer includes 5 GB of internet, 3500 Telenor minutes, 200 minutes to other networks, and 3500 SMS. It's available for Rs. 350, valid for 15 days, and can be subscribed through easypaisa.

You can subscribe to the 15 Days Plus offer exclusively through easypaisa. It costs Rs. 350 and provides 5 GB of internet, 3500 on-net minutes, 200 off-net minutes, and 3500 SMS for 15 days.
